name: CNB Financial Corporation
description: CNB Financial Corporation is a financial services holding company based in Pennsylvania, primarily engaged in commercial banking through its subsidiary, CNB Bank. Founded in 1865, the bank has a rich history of serving the community and providing a range of financial products and services, including personal and business banking, wealth management, and insurance solutions. With a commitment to customer service and community involvement, CNB Bank operates numerous branches across Pennsylvania and offers a variety of digital banking services. The bank is dedicated to fostering economic growth in the regions it serves by providing loans, investment services, and financial education to individuals and businesses alike. CNB Financial Corporation is also focused on maintaining strong financial performance and stability, ensuring it can meet the needs of its customers while adhering to regulatory requirements. Additionally, the corporation actively seeks opportunities for growth through strategic acquisitions and partnerships, aiming to expand its footprint and enhance its service offerings in the competitive financial services market.

seo.meta_title: CNB Financial Corporation | Banking and Financial Services
seo.meta_description: Explore CNB Financial Corporation, a leading provider of banking and financial services in Pennsylvania, committed to community growth and customer satisfaction.

faq.question: What services does CNB Bank offer?
faq.answer: CNB Bank offers personal banking, business banking, mortgage services, wealth management, and insurance solutions.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of CNB Financial Corporation?
faq.answer: J. William McCarthy is the CEO of CNB Financial Corporation.

faq.question: Where is CNB Financial headquartered?
faq.answer: CNB Financial is headquartered in Clearfield, Pennsylvania, USA.

faq.question: When was CNB Financial Corporation founded?
faq.answer: CNB Financial Corporation was founded in 1865.
